title: Academy Awards nominations in 2020 , by film
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of nominations, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely neutral which exists from Little_Women to Ford_v_Ferrari.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely neutral which exists from The_Irishman to Once_Upon_a_Time_in_Hollywood.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from Joker to The_Irishman.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from Once_Upon_a_Time_in_Hollywood to Little_Women.

data.Year: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

gold: In 2020 , the movie with the most Oscar nominations was 'Joker ' _ , with 11 in total . 'Joker ' was directed by Todd Philips , whose work includes movies within 'The Hangover ' franchise , 'Due Date ' _ , and 'War Dogs ' _ . Philips also produced major hit ' A Star is Born ' _ .
